appName.message: TubeX: YouTube AI神器(永久免费)

appDesc.message: 内置Google和GPT3.5的AI引擎的YouTube字幕翻译神器

note.message: Note: By default, TubeX supports free usage of Google Translate for users. If you want higher quality translations and the AI capabilities integrated in ChatGPT, please enter your OpenAI API KEY to use.

alert.message: 请点击右上角的TubeX图标，打开TubeX填入您的OpenAI API KEY。中国区用户可加微信15502178435，申请开通GPT账户。
